vulnerability_findings.name: use-prefix-decrement-not-postfix
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider using the prefix decrement expression whenever the return value is not needed. The prefix decrement expression is cheaper in terms of gas.

vulnerability_findings.name: constant-function
vulnerability_findings.message: AddressUtils.isContract (ERC721Token.sol#264-275) is declared view but contains assembly code

vulnerability_findings.name: erc20-interface
vulnerability_findings.message:
ERC721Basic (ERC721Token.sol#32-109) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-approve (ERC721Token.sol#90)
	-transferFrom (ERC721Token.sol#98)

vulnerability_findings.name: erc20-interface
vulnerability_findings.message:
ERC721BasicToken (ERC721Token.sol#345-643) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-approve (ERC721Token.sol#413-420)
	-transferFrom (ERC721Token.sol#468-484)

vulnerability_findings.name: assembly
vulnerability_findings.message:
AddressUtils.isContract uses assembly (ERC721Token.sol#264-275)
	- ERC721Token.sol#273-274
